analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.7. Sappaccayaduka🔽Naappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: sap paccaya duka  na appaccayam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Modes of Conveying🔽The Dyad on with Conditions🔽With a condition that is not a condition …

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)🔽Naappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro  na appaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na appaccayassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ
translated: With a cause as condition …🔽With an object as condition …

original: Nasappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ na appaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ 🔽hetuyā eka ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā dve pe upanissaye dve pe avigate eka sabbattha vitthāro
translated: With a condition that is not a condition …
